body.p:
State of Kentucky
McLean County Sct.

I Douglas Little presiding Judge for McLean county ^Kentucky^ do certify that John T. Kennard appeared before me and took the following oath to wit; I John T. Kennard do solemnly swear that I will faithfully support the constitution of the United States And the ^constitution^ of Kentucky and will discharge all and singular the duties and services appertaining to the office of Adjutant in the volunteer Militia agreeably the law and general regulations and will obey such orders and instructions as I shall from time to time receive from the proper officers Which is hereby certified to General head Quarters
Given under my hand at Calhoon Ky 23rd November 1861

1861
Douglas Little
P. J. McLean County
